Melbourne Forecast

View the current warnings for Victoria

Forecast issued at 5:18 am EDT on Thursday 8 November 2012.

Forecast for the rest of Thursday

Summary
Max 21
Shower or two.
Chance of any rain: 60%
Rainfall amount: 0 to 1 mm

Melbourne area

Partly cloudy. Isolated showers. The chance of thunderstorms, mainly in the late afternoon. Winds west to southwesterly and light increasing to 15 to 20 km/h in the early afternoon then turning southerly 15 to 25 km/h in the late afternoon.

Fire Danger - Low-Moderate

UV Alert from 9:20 am to 4:40 pm, UV Index predicted to reach 9 [Very High]

Around Melbourne

Precis Icon Location Min Max
Melbourne – 21
Geelong – 20
Laverton – 20
Tullamarine – 21
Scoresby – 21
Watsonia – 21
Mount Dandenong – 18
Yarra Glen – 22
Frankston – 19

Friday 9 November

Summary
Min 12
Max 18
Shower or two.

Melbourne area

Partly cloudy. Scattered showers, mainly in the east and southeast. Winds south to southwesterly and light tending westerly 20 to 30 km/h before dawn then tending southwesterly in the late afternoon.

Saturday 10 November

Summary
Min 11
Max 20
Early shower or two.

Melbourne area

Partly cloudy. Isolated showers during the morning. Winds southwesterly 15 to 20 km/h turning south to southeasterly and becoming light during the day.

Sunday 11 November

Summary
Min 8
Max 26
Sunny.

Melbourne area

Sunny. Light winds becoming northerly 15 to 20 km/h during the afternoon.

Monday 12 November

Summary
Min 17
Max 25
Shower or two.

Melbourne area

Partly cloudy. Isolated showers. Winds northerly 25 to 35 km/h shifting south to southwesterly during the day.

Tuesday 13 November

Summary
Min 12
Max 20
Partly cloudy.

Melbourne area

Partly cloudy. Winds southwesterly 15 to 20 km/h turning southerly during the morning.

Wednesday 14 November

Summary
Min 10
Max 25
Mostly sunny.

Melbourne area

Mostly sunny. Light winds becoming southeast to southwesterly 20 to 30 km/h during the day.

The next routine forecast will be issued at 4:20 pm EDT Thursday.

Product IDV10450
